You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &tcedil;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Tcedil;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0162/index.htm U+00162].
  * `&tcedil;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0163/index.htm U+00163].
